sourcesContent: 'use strict' import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Label, FormGroup, Input } from 'reactstrap'; import BenModal from '../../../../components/BenModal'; export default class MyForm extends Component { render(){ const modal = this.props.modal || {}; const data = modal.data || {}; return( { modal.onChange('code',e.target.value) }} defaultValue={data.code} id="code" /> { modal.onChange('type',e.target.value) }} defaultValue={data.type} id="type"> { modal.onChange('debt_num',e.target.value) }} defaultValue={data.debt_num} min={1} max={365} type="number" id="debt_num" /> { modal.onChange('name',e.target.value) }} defaultValue={data.name} type="text" id="name" /> { modal.onChange('detail',e.target.value) }} defaultValue={data.detail} id="detail" /> ) } }
